How To Play 
 The game functions as a real life snake game. 
 By walking around in the real world, you will be able to see that your movement is being tracked on the screen. 
 The purpose of the game is to gather as many cheese objects as you can before the timer runs out. The faster you collect the cheese, the more points you get. 
 For each piece of cheese that is picked up, your tail grows in size. 
 But be careful! If you run into yourself, you die and the game is over. You will also die if you stand still for too long after picking up a cheese, so keep moving at all times to reach a greater highscore!
